hudson.util
Class ShiftedCategoryAxis

java.lang.Object
  CategoryAxis
      hudson.util.ShiftedCategoryAxis

public final class ShiftedCategoryAxis
extends CategoryAxis

CategoryAxis shifted to left to eliminate redundant space between area and the Y-axis.
